children.text: You can retrieve your old messages after moving to a new device, if backup enabled.
Provide to send and receive sms from contacts who doesn't use BiP without exiting BiP.
Enables to download the incoming media automatically.
Enables to save the incoming media automatically.
If you turn last seen off, you won't be able to see last seen information of your friends.
If you turn read information off, you won't be able to see read information of messages you sent.
Enables to choose the default call type
You can disable preview in order to send sticker & caps faster.
